hero.badge: âš¡ The First Starter Built for Vibe Coding
hero.title: Vibe Code Your AI SaaS to Production
hero.description: No coding skills? Perfect. Sistine + AI coding assistants = Your SaaS idea live in hours. Just describe what you want. Ship what users love.

features.title: Everything You Need for Vibe Coding Success
features.subtitle: Stop wasting time on boilerplate. Focus on describing your unique features while Sistine handles the foundation. Ship faster with AI.

aiOptimized.title: Built for AI-Assisted Development
aiOptimized.description: Perfectly structured for Cursor, Windsurf, and Claude Code. Every file, every component optimized for AI understanding and modification.

zeroPipeline.title: Zero to Production Pipeline
zeroPipeline.description: Authentication, payments, database, deployment - all configured. Just prompt your AI assistant and watch your SaaS come to life.

nonTechnical.title: Non-Technical Founder Friendly
nonTechnical.description: Don't know React from Rails? Doesn't matter. If you can describe your idea clearly, you can ship a SaaS product.

productionGrade.title: Production-Grade from Day One
productionGrade.description: Real users, real payments, real scale. Built on Next.js, PostgreSQL, and Creem - the same stack powering billion-dollar companies.

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Simple, transparent pricing that scales with your business
pricing.description: This pricing section is built with Sistine Starter. Creem subscriptions, usage tracking, and billing portal included. Start free, upgrade when you need more power.

testimonials.title: Success Stories from Vibe Coders
testimonials.subtitle: Real developers and non-technical founders sharing their experience building AI SaaS products with Sistine and Vibe Coding.

items.name: Manu Arora
items.quote: I'm not a developer. I'm a marketer. But I shipped my AI SaaS in 3 days using Sistine + Cursor. Now making $5K MRR.

items.name: Tyler Durden
items.quote: Spent years learning to code. Now my non-technical co-founder ships features faster than me using Vibe Coding. This is the future.

items.name: Alice Johnson
items.quote: From idea to $10K MRR in 2 months. All vibes, no code. Sistine made it possible to compete with funded startups.

items.name: Bob Smith
items.quote: Built and launched 3 different AI SaaS products this quarter alone. Vibe Coding with Sistine is my secret weapon.

items.name: Cathy Lee
items.quote: I describe features in plain English to Claude Code. Sistine handles the rest. Shipping has never been this fast.

items.name: David Wright
items.quote: The authentication, payments, and deployment just work. I focus on unique features. My SaaS was profitable week one.

items.name: Eva Green
items.quote: The efficiency it brings is unmatched. It's a vital tool that has helped us cut costs and improve our end product significantly.

items.name: Frank Moore
items.quote: A robust solution that fits perfectly into our workflow. It has enhanced our team's capabilities and allowed us to tackle more complex projects.

items.name: Grace Hall
items.quote: It's incredibly intuitive and easy to use. Even those without technical expertise can leverage its power to improve their workflows.

items.name: Henry Ford
items.quote: It has saved us countless hours. Highly recommended for anyone looking to enhance their efficiency and productivity.

items.name: Ivy Wilson
items.quote: A must-have tool for any professional. It's revolutionized the way we approach problem-solving and decision-making.

items.name: Jack Brown
items.quote: The results are always impressive. This AI has helped us to not only meet but exceed our performance targets.

items.name: Kathy Adams
items.quote: It helps us achieve what was once thought impossible. The AI's capabilities are groundbreaking and have opened new avenues for us.

items.name: Leo Carter
items.quote: Transformative technology with real impact. It has streamlined our operations and brought unprecedented efficiency to our processes.

items.name: Mia Turner
items.quote: It's simply revolutionary! The way it integrates with our existing systems and enhances them is nothing short of miraculous.

companies.title: Built with Industry-Leading Technologies
companies.subtitle: Built on modern stack trusted by the world's best teams

aiReady.title: AI-Ready Architecture
aiReady.description: Pre-configured OpenAI, Anthropic, and Groq integrations. Add your API key and start building.

creem.title: Creem Payments
creem.description: Complete billing system with subscriptions, usage tracking, and customer portal built-in.

auth.title: Authentication System
auth.description: Better Auth with email/password and OAuth. Session management and protected routes ready.

deploy.title: One-Click Deploy
deploy.description: Deploy to Vercel, Railway, or any platform instantly. Production-ready from day one.

typescript.title: TypeScript + Tailwind
typescript.description: Modern tech stack with Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui components.

database.title: Database + ORM
database.description: PostgreSQL with Drizzle ORM. Type-safe queries and migrations configured.

seo.title: SEO & Marketing
seo.description: Meta tags, Open Graph, sitemap, and analytics. Everything for organic growth.

vibeCoding.title: Vibe Coding Ready
vibeCoding.description: Optimized for Cursor, Windsurf, and Claude Code. AI understands every component.

cta.title: Ready to Ship Your AI SaaS?
cta.description: Join hundreds of developers who launched their SaaS products with Sistine and Vibe Coding.
